title: Giving Thanks! Part 3
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>Ah, rewind it back to Kasumin’s solo part just now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Huh, why?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Everyone needs to see how cute Kasumin is again.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Don’t stop the video just because of that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Hey, don’t say that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0201/>Well, Kasumi-chan is also cute even when she’s not performing solo, so we should just keep watching.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Okay, you’re not wrong...... Fine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Who wants to eat red bean porridge with mochi~?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Me~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I want 5 mochi, please!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Alright~ Bon appétit~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Let me help you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Thanks, Emma-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Ah, it’s Kanata’s turn! Look!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>When I listen to Kanata-san’s songs, I get sleepy......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Me too......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>It was a great idea to hold a screening of all our live concerts at the end of the year. This is bringing back a lot of memories.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yeah, reflecting upon the past year is very important! This past year really seems to have flown by.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Is it end-of-the-year magic?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>You’re all too laid back right now! My solo is right after this so hurry up and get hyped!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
